scripts.release: changeset version && pnpm -r install --no-frozen-lockfile && changeset publish
scripts.release:beta:add: changeset add --empty --summary 'Beta prerelease for mcpay' --packages mcpay
scripts.release:beta: pnpm release:beta:enter && pnpm release:beta:add && pnpm release:beta:version && pnpm release:beta:publish
scripts.release:stable:add: changeset add --empty --summary 'Stable release for mcpay' --packages mcpay
scripts.release:stable: pnpm release:exit-pre && pnpm release:stable:add && pnpm release:stable:version && pnpm release:stable:publish
